tweets.text: Thank you Baroness Golding for the work you have done behind the scenes and your tireless support for the people of Newcastle @StinkStopthe @SueGBee @fayedavies @EnvAgency @guardianeco #StopTheStink https://t.co/kwXCCiSlBQ

5th Mar met the @EnvAgency for clarification on how they intend to monitor and regulate HS2 tunnelling and its impact on the chalk aquifer. Asked what experience they have monitoring tunnelling through chalk, obviously forgotten the Ennerdale tunnel under the River Hull. https://t.co/qVBnbF77eo

The Shardeloes Lake pollution May/June 2020 in the Misbourne Valley is still unresolved, interesting to analyse the role played by @EnvAgency and HS2. Spreading misleading information successfully shut down public debate. https://t.co/pUXFJAqUNR
More inaccuracies included in the @EnvAgency email 2nd June 2020 on the pollution incident at Shardeloes Lake in the Misbourne Valley. We suspect the hand of HS2. https://t.co/zAllN1f84C

tweets.text: Marine debris that enters the Mississippi River poses a threat to the environment. As the drainage system for 40% of the United States, plastic litter easily travels through this river system & eventually to the ocean. Action to #BeatPollution is in store: https://t.co/aYfz3tFAFd https://t.co/cG9GNcJYWs

We‚Äôre identifying a lot of opportunities in the Churnet Valley through our #WEG project @EnvAgencyMids @NE_WestMids @CatchmentDove. We‚Äôre offering bespoke advice to > 20 farms on all things water related from soil health to slowing the flow. All to create cleaner rivers. https://t.co/8IhsxHVBoC

Great to be out yesterday with one of our members marking out areas for creating channels & wetland features to rewet this area of land on the floodplain of the River Dove. We‚Äôre #boostingbiodiversity with support & funding from @stwater @EnvAgencyMids @CatchmentDove. https://t.co/N0sr9X5xDW

Hey @EnvAgency - #Bude Weir is making loud beeping error like noise from inside the building.. 
Anything to worry about? https://t.co/ZacUL672Qo

Here is our former MP Baroness Golding, who‚Äôs been working hard on behalf of all our residents to make sure the facts about Walley's Quarry are known. Llin continues to be a tireless campaigner for Newcastle and fully supports our Lab Councillors #stopthestink #newcastlelabour https://t.co/UbLbULYmqN

Pleased to be working with @AttinghamParkNT near #Shrewsbury to create a new wetland habitat for the reintroduction of #watervole. This threatened small creature is important to ecosystems. https://t.co/EoqBCWoEjn

Growing grassland! Over the last few months, our #culmgrassland team have been busy with winter works. Staff and volunteers have cleared encroaching scrub from 6 #culmgrassland sites, whilst creating new habitats - go team!

Thanks @Interreg2Seas, @DevonCC & @EnvAgency üì∏M Symes https://t.co/Uykotncqj8
